thread.section_title: Italki 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Italki 的点评意见 | www.italki.com
thread.title: Don Barron
thread.title_full: Italki 的点评人 Don Barron

author: Don Barron
title: Don Barron
text: The broad range of teachers from around the world who are native speakers with credentials and experience and who offer reasonable prices for individual lesson (and even greater discounts for packages) makes italki the best option for anyone looking to start learning or continue improving his or her language skills. The service even provides instant tutoring as an option.
